title: Forest
description: A dense forest. The sky is almostly completely obscured by branches and leaves. Leaves, sticks, and other debris litters the ground. The soil beneath the debris layer is rich and dark, with white fungal strands visible through out. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
